title: Cannabis - A Sobering Perspective
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Kristen Yoder, host of The CannaBS Detector and a cannabis veteran, gives an unvarnished take on the cannabis industry. Kristen's #1 complaint about the industry. Why she'd rather be short cannabis stocks than long and where she does feel comfortable putting her money. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
